eventDecorators.name: AddPool
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when an update to `requestTokensRemoved` is made. Emitted when the implementation of a variable debt token is upgraded.

eventDecorators.name: CreatePool
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when an update to `requestTokensRemoved` is made. Emitted when the implementation of a variable debt token is upgraded.

eventDecorators.description: Emitted when an update to `requestTokensRemoved` is made. Emitted when the implementation of a variable debt token is upgraded.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when an update to `requestTokensRemoved` is made. Emitted when the implementation of a variable debt token is upgraded.

eventDecorators.description: Emitted when an update to `requestTokensRemoved` is made. Emitted when the implementation of a variable debt token is upgraded.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: proxy

eventDecorators.description: Emitted when an update to `requestTokensRemoved` is made. Emitted when the implementation of a variable debt token is upgraded.

parameterDecorators.name: asset

parameterDecorators.name: implementation

parameterDecorators.name: proxy

parameterDecorators.name: role
parameterDecorators.description: role account.

parameterDecorators.name: account
parameterDecorators.description: account for adding to the role.

functionDecorators.name: addPool
functionDecorators.description: Add new smart contract investment pool.

parameterDecorators.name: poolAddress
parameterDecorators.description: The address investment pool.

returnDecorators.description: A boolean that indicates if the operation was successful.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: The address token contract for investment pool.

parameterDecorators.name: locked
parameterDecorators.description: The blocking period of assets.

parameterDecorators.name: rate
parameterDecorators.description: The address to query the wager of.

parameterDecorators.name: interestFee
parameterDecorators.description: The asset withdrawal commission.

parameterDecorators.name: anualPrecent
parameterDecorators.description: The annual percentage of tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: superAdmin
parameterDecorators.description: The An address that has privileges SUPER_ADMIN_ROLE.

parameterDecorators.name: gPartner
parameterDecorators.description: The An address that has privileges GENERAL_PARTNER_ROLE.

parameterDecorators.name: lPartner
parameterDecorators.description: The An address that has privileges LIMITED_PARTNER_ROLE.

parameterDecorators.name: team
parameterDecorators.description: The An address that has privileges TEAM_ROLE.

parameterDecorators.name: sturtapTeam
parameterDecorators.description: The An address that has privileges STURTAP_TEAM_ROLE.

parameterDecorators.name: referer
parameterDecorators.description: The An address that has privileges REFERER_ROLE.

returnDecorators.description: A boolean that indicates if the operation was successful.

functionDecorators.name: getMembersRole
functionDecorators.description: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. * To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

parameterDecorators.name: pool
parameterDecorators.description: The address investment pool.

functionDecorators.name: getRoleAdmin
functionDecorators.description: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. * To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

functionDecorators.name: getRoleMember
functionDecorators.description: Returns one of the accounts that have `role`. `index` must be a value between 0 and {getRoleMemberCount}, non-inclusive. * Role bearers are not sorted in any particular way, and their ordering may change at any point. * WARNING: When using {getRoleMember} and {getRoleMemberCount}, make sure you perform all queries on the same block. See the following https://forum.openzeppelin.com/t/iterating-over-elements-on-enumerableset-in-openzeppelin-contracts/2296[forum post] for more information.

functionDecorators.name: getRoleMemberCount
functionDecorators.description: Returns the number of accounts that have `role`. Can be used together with {getRoleMember} to enumerate all bearers of a role.

functionDecorators.name: grantRole
functionDecorators.description: Grants `role` to `account`. * If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. * Requirements: * - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: renounceRole
functionDecorators.description: Revokes `role` from the calling account. * Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). * If the calling account had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. * Requirements: * - the caller must be `account`.

functionDecorators.name: revokeRole
functionDecorators.description: Revokes `role` from `account`. * If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. * Requirements: * - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role.

parameterDecorators.name: pool
parameterDecorators.description: The address investment pool.

parameterDecorators.name: lock
parameterDecorators.description: The blocking period of assets.

parameterDecorators.name: rate
parameterDecorators.description: The address to query the wager of.

parameterDecorators.name: interestFee
parameterDecorators.description: The asset withdrawal commission.

parameterDecorators.name: anualPrecent
parameterDecorators.description: The annual percentage of tokens.

returnDecorators.description: A boolean that indicates if the operation was successful.
